Text:
I uploaded this because the Amplitube 3.9 Mac torrent has several effects that do not work -- rack delay, rack chorus, some chorus stomp boxes, and others.

This is fixed in this version (3.9.1).

Enjoy!
Thank you! I was wondering why the delays weren't working in my copy of 3.9 and just assumed it was something to do with my system.
No "seperate" crack, is this an AU, VST or what?
@zarquonp Just a clarification -- this includes both the standalone version of Amplitube as well as the VST and AU plugins for OS X.

Hey there, I downloaded, installed, ran the crack and all seemed to be fine. However, when I tried to open both the standalone and the AU version, i get an error message that says the Amplitube 3.vpa exectuable cannot be opened.
Any ideas what could be the cause/how to fix?

Cheers anyway
J
